title: Real-time Chat Message Delivery
description: Verify that the MechaStream Chat Interface delivers messages with minimal latency including support for text and file attachments.

steps.description: Open MechaStream Chat Interface.
Send a text message.
Confirm the message appears to recipient in under 2 seconds.
Attach and send a file.
Verify the attached file is received and downloadable by recipient.

title: Code IDE Syntax Highlighting and Error Detection
description: Check that Monaco Editor in the Code IDE correctly highlights syntax and displays errors for supported languages.

steps.description: Open IDE and create new file in Python.
Write syntactically correct Python code.
Verify correct syntax highlighting.
Introduce syntax errors in the code.
Confirm error indications appear inline with descriptive messages.

title: WebContainer Terminal Code Execution
description: Validate terminal simulation executes Python, Node.js, and HTML code with accurate output display.

steps.description: Open WebContainer Terminal.
Execute a simple Python print statement.
Output displays the correct printed result.
Execute Node.js simple console.log command.
Console output appears correctly.
Run HTML code preview command.
Correct HTML preview output is displayed.

title: AI API Provider Fallback Mechanism
description: Test multi-provider AI API fallback works seamlessly without user disruption if primary provider fails.

steps.description: Simulate primary AI API provider outage.
Send AI query from chat interface.
System automatically switches to secondary provider and returns AI response.
Simulate all providers being unreachable.
User receives clear error notification and retry option.

title: Switching Between Chat Interfaces
description: Verify user can switch between MechaStream Chat, ChatGPT Style, and Vibe Chat interfaces with consistent functionality.

steps.description: Load chat interface.
Switch to ChatGPT Style interface.
Chat loads with correct style and functions as expected.
Switch to Vibe Chat interface.
Animations and chat features function correctly.
Switch back to MechaStream Chat interface.
Chat resumes with prior session and no errors.

title: Live Preview Builder Real-time Updates
description: Verify Live Preview Builder updates immediately after code changes in IDE without manual refresh.

steps.description: Open code in IDE.
Modify code that affects UI output.
Live Preview Builder updates instantly reflecting the changes.
Introduce invalid code that causes rendering errors.
Show error or fallback UI gracefully in preview.

title: Application Deployment via Deployment Manager
description: Check that deploying an application logs deployment actions and results in a successful hosted app.

steps.description: Prepare a valid app for deployment.
Initiate deployment from Deployment Manager.
Deployment action is logged and status is displayed.
Deployed app is accessible via hosted URL.
Deploy with intentionally broken configuration.
User receives clear error feedback and deployment does not proceed.

title: Navigation and UI Customization Persistence
description: Verify user navigation settings and UI customizations persist across sessions and devices.

steps.description: Change navigation layout and customize theme.
Log out and log in on same and different devices.
User's navigation layout and theme settings remain consistent.

title: Analytics and Error Monitoring Dashboards Accuracy
description: Check that dashboards display up-to-date usage metrics and error data accurately.

steps.description: Trigger events that generate analytics and errors.
Open Analytics Dashboard and Error Display.
Monitor shows latest metrics and error occurrences correctly.

title: AI Provider API Configuration Validation
description: Ensure API settings dashboard validates input credentials and configurations before applying.

steps.description: Open API Settings Dashboard.
Input invalid API credentials.
Validation errors are shown and settings are not saved.
Input valid API keys and parameters.
Settings are saved and API calls use new configuration.

title: Real-time API Status Indicator
description: Confirm that API Status Indicator updates and displays the availability status of each AI provider in real-time.

steps.description: Simulate AI provider service going offline and back online.
API Status Indicator reflects real-time status changes accurately.

title: Web Search Function Integration in Chats
description: Validate web search queries from chat interface return relevant real-time information correctly.

steps.description: Open chat and invoke web search feature.
Submit common search query.
Chat displays accurate real-time web search results.
Submit invalid or empty search query.
System handles gracefully with informative error or no results message.

title: Theme Customizer Persistence and Application
description: Verify UI theme changes via Theme Customizer apply instantly and persist on reload.

steps.description: Open Theme Customizer and change colors/fonts.
UI updates immediately with new theme.
Reload application in same browser.
Theme customizations persist after reload.

title: Code Templates and Snippets Accessibility
description: Ensure users can browse, select, and insert pre-built code templates and snippets into the IDE.

steps.description: Open Code Templates library.
Select a pre-built code snippet.
Insert snippet into open file in IDE.
Snippet code inserts correctly at cursor position.

title: Error Display Consistency Across Features
description: Check that all modules display clear and consistent error messages with recovery suggestions when errors occur.

steps.description: Trigger errors in chat, IDE, API Settings, Deployment Manager and Live Preview.
Error Display component shows meaningful messages with guidance.
Verify error toasts appear where appropriate.
User can acknowledge or retry operations following errors.
